com.vectorprint.configuration.binding

Interface BindingHelper

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    ParamBindingHelper
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractBindingHelperDecorator, AbstractParamBindingHelperDecorator, BindingHelperImpl, EscapingBindingHelper, JSONBindingHelper, ParamBindingHelperImpl

    public interface BindingHelper
    Responsible for converting Strings into (atomic) values and vise versa. BindingHelpers are Threadsafe.
    Author:
    Eduard Drenth at VectorPrint.nl

    • Method Detail

      • escape

        String escape(String value)
        use this from serializeValue(java.lang.Object) if you need to escape syntax specific characters. Note that overriding only this method when extending AbstractBindingHelperDecorator will not work, because the overridden method will not be called by the encapsulated BindingHelper.
        Parameters:
        value -
        Returns:
        See Also:
        setEscapeChars(char[])

      • setEscapeChars

        void setEscapeChars(char[] chars)
        set characters to be escaped, do this from the constructors when extending AbstractBindingHelperDecorator.
        Parameters:
        chars -

      • serializeValue

        String serializeValue(Object value)
        Serialize Objects and arrays of Objects and primitives in a specific syntax. Array values will be separated by the separator.
        Parameters:
        value -
        Returns:
        the String
